metaDescription: Turnkey electronics manufacturing, PCB assembly, and box build services, custom-built in the USA for OEMs and industrial applications.
headlines: End-to-End Electronics Manufacturing Solutions to Help You Scale Your Capacity & Capabilities
aboutSummary: When failure isn’t an option, you need a partner you can trust. PTG delivers precision-engineered electronics through dependable processes, trusted performance, and a shared commitment to quality, speed, and innovation every time, at the pace of progress.
valueProps: When failure isn’t an option, you need a partner you can trust.
Over decades of sourcing, PTG has built a global supply chain network of trusted domestic and offshore partners.
Our team brings decades of experience in electronics design and production.
PTG Electronics delivers comprehensive product life cycle support for electronics manufacturing.
